amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds by the Army Corps of Engineers in contravention of WRRDA requirements regarding harbor maintenance spending levels for the Great Lakes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in contravention of the Water Resources Development Act of 1986.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kelly (PA) amendment (A076) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A076) offered by Mr. Kelly (PA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kelly (PA) amendment (A076) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
